Title: Relates to business income base and certain small business taxpayers
Summary: Relates to business income base and certain small business taxpayers.
LawCode: Amd §§210 & 612, Tax L; amd §11-1712, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to business income base and certain small business taxpayers
